name: RuleDataObjects
shortdesc: A collection of prefight rule data objects.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Add a new preflight rule data to a preflight profile rule.

parameter.name: name
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the rule data to add

parameter.name: dataValue
parameter.shortdesc: The value of data. Can accept: String, Real, Long Integer, Short Integer, Boolean, Object or Array of Strings, Reals, Long Integers, Short Integers, Booleans, Objects or Arrays of Array of Arrays of Array of Strings, Reals, Long Integers, Short Integers, Booleans or Objects.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new RuleDataObject &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the RuleDataObject.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the RuleDataObjects within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The RuleDataObject, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: RuleDataObject, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The RuleDataObject, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: RuleDataObject, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first RuleDataObject in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last RuleDataObject in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle RuleDataObject in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the RuleDataObject with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the RuleDataObject that follows the desired RuleDataObject.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the RuleDataObject whose index follows the specified RuleDataObject in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The RuleDataObject whose index comes before the desired RuleDataObject.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any RuleDataObject in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every RuleDataObject in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the RuleDataObject.
Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
